titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford University, Department of History, Student Papers
Stanford University, Department of History, Student Papers

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: Stanford University, Department of History, student papers

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stanford University, Department of History, Student Papers (SC0556). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains class notes, research papers, and a few senior theses from history classes at Stanford University, 1892-1903 with a few from 1907-08 and 1925-26. Classes were in ancient, European, and American history.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The papers are arranged alphabetically by student author. For those women students who later married, their married name is included in paratheses after their maiden name.
